b'Ninja Box': b'In the anime\'s story, Hiroto longs to build a secret base near his house, and in his house\'s storeroom he meets a ninja and "Nintuber" named Tonkachi. Tonkachi, who knows about the existence of the "Ninja Box," forces Tonkachi to go to the "Village of Tatemakuri," where they meet a talking dog named Tatezou. \n\n(Source: ANN)'
